org.csstudio.nams.common.activatorUtils
Class AbstractEclipseRCPApplication

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.nams.common.activatorUtils.AbstractEclipseRCPApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.equinox.app.IApplication, org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator
public abstract class AbstractEclipseRCPApplication
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator, org.eclipse.equinox.app.IApplication

Note: There will be 2 instances of this class: BundleActivator and IApplication; all sharing fields have to be static. Note: It is forbidden to declare a constructor! (To ensure initialisation is only done in the method ment for it!) Default Application 

 public class MyApplication extends AbstractEclipseRCPApplication {
 
     @ApplicationInitializer
     public void initializeApplication(
         @OSGiService MyService service, 
         @ExecutableEclipseRCPExtension(extensionId = MyExtensionType.class)
             Object myExtension)
     {
         // Do s.th. Extension are only avail here!!!
     }
     
     @ApplicationStep
     public ApplicationStepResult oneStepOfIteratingCallsToPerformApplicationsOperation(
         @OSGiService MyService service ) throws Throwable
     {
         // Do one(!) step of work...
         
         // Continue work, call this method again...
         return ApplicationStepResult.CONTINUE;
     }
     
     @ApplicationCleanUpPoint
     public void shutdownApplication(
         @OSGiService MyService service )
     {
         // Do some clean ups...
     }
     
     @ApplicationStepExceptionHandler
     public ApplicationStepResult handleExceptionInApplicationStep(
         Throwable occurred, 
         // optional additional params...
         @OSGiService MyService service 
     ) throws Throwable // if can't be handled.
     {
         // handle exception/error...
         
         // Continue work, call step-method again... (or s.th. matching.)
         return ApplicationStepResult.CONTINUE;
     }
 }
